Items.Title: Oversight - Findings of the Department of Buildings’ Suspended Scaffold Worker Safety Task Force
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Findings of the Department of Buildings’ Suspended Scaffold Worker Safety Task Force

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to inspection requirements for suspended scaffolds.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notification to the department prior to the use or installation of suspended scaffolds hung from c-hooks and outrigger beams.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Notification to the department prior to the use or installation of suspended scaffolds hung from c-hooks and outrigger beams.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to penalties for certain violations committed by licensed riggers or persons performing the functions and duties of licensed riggers, or other persons responsible for keeping inspection records at job sites.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Penalties for certain violations committed by licensed riggers or persons performing the functions and duties of licensed riggers, or other persons responsible for keeping inspection records at job sites.
